va-survivor-pension-child.title: Survivor Pension for Child
va-survivor-pension-child.headline: Survivor Pension for Child
va-survivor-pension-child.source.name: U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs
va-survivor-pension-child.summary: Monthly payments may be available to qualified surviving dependent children of wartime veterans who meet certain income and net worth limits.
va-survivor-pension-child.eligibility.la: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
va-survivor-pension-child.eligibility.ac: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
va-survivor-pension-child.eligibility.la: You are under 18 years old (under 23 years old if attending a VA-approved school).
